components.mentoring.session.iterationVi:
**Functional Purpose**: Message indicating an iteration has been deleted
**UI Location**: Mentoring session iteration view, in place of iteration content
**When Users See This**: When the currently selected iteration has been marked as deleted
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "This iteration has been deleted"
iterationHeader.downloadButton.downloadS:
**Functional Purpose**: Alternative text for the download icon
**UI Location**: Mentoring session iteration header, download button
**When Users See This**: When the download icon is displayed, for accessibility purposes
**Technical Context**: Used as the `alt` attribute for an `Icon` component. Must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "Download solution"
iterationHeader.downloadButton.downloadT:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the download panel
**UI Location**: Mentoring session iteration header, within the download button's dropdown panel
**When Users See This**: When the user clicks the download button in the iteration header
**Technical Context**: Standard text for a header (h3)
**Current English**: "Download this solution via the CLI"
iterationHeader.downloadButton.solutionD:
**Functional Purpose**: Explanatory text about where the solution will be downloaded
**UI Location**: Mentoring session iteration header, within the download button's dropdown panel
**When Users See This**: When the user clicks the download button in the iteration header
**Technical Context**: Standard paragraph text. Refers to a 'subdirectory' for the student.
**Current English**: "This solution will be downloaded into a subdirectory specifically for this student."
